api_list.name: GET / Return current external ip address
api_list.description: Returns a payload that signifies your current ip address with an optional error attribute.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whats-my-ip3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whats-my-ip3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://whats-my-ip3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whats-my-ip3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
